definition_en: A series of technical and administrative reports or books published by the US Nuclear Regulatory Commission.
definition_ko: 미국 원자력 규제 위원회에서 발행하는 기술 및 행정 보고서 또는 서적 시리즈.

slots.context_ko: The NUREG series comprises (1) brochures (NUREGBR-X)XX), (2) proceedings of conferences (NUREG/CP-XXXX), (3) reports resulting from international agreements (NUREG/IA-)OOXQ, (4) technical and administrative reports and books [(NUREG-XXXX) or (NUREG/CR-)00X]...
